game.name: SICARIO KID
game.description:
In this one of the best shooting games for boys, you have got an opportunity to play the role of a sicario kid, who is known by the mafiaâ€™s hitman in the dangerous and heartless world of blood and money. You have decided to enter the biggest battle where you will see nothing, but a horde of enemies who are thirsty for your blood. One thing that can help you to survive in this bloody environment is to fight against them. 

Get ready to eliminate all blood-thirsty enemies by putting your ultimate shooting ability in Sicario Kid game! We can understand you find difficulty at initial level while browsing this brand new action game. However, keep trying it for several times in your desktop or mobile phone until you will get the good command. Kill as many enemies as possible in this quick-shot duel game! Your every successful kill will give you some points that you can use further to customize your look, upgrade your gear and raise your gang rank. 

Remember only your single barrage of accurate and deadly gunfire will help you to destroy your enemies. Keep your eyes ready to read out the notification on the screen to know when to hire! Do not keep your fingers on rest on your mouse or mobile phone to clean your area from the bad guys in this brilliant duelling game! Apply your fine shooting skills to make you quick draw character stronger! Good luck to defeat all your opponents you see in your way in this epic online shooter game!
